name: Easter Survivors
description:
This game was made for the Pygame Easter Jam 2023. It's a 'survivors-like' inspired by Vampire Survivors. It was made from scratch in under 7 days. The jam themes are "pastel colors", "particle overdose", and "silly music".

You use the WASD or Arrow Keys to move. When you level up, press 1, 2, or 3 to select your upgrade.

Pressing ESC will pause the game (or quit when on the title).

## Credits

Pygame-CE

Music:

https://dopeloop.ai/melody-generator

Images by DALL-E modified by me

Sound FX: pyfxr

You can have all the source code here: https://github.com/bsparks/pygame-easter-jam
